name: Kit Showcase - King of the Hill
name_original: Kit Showcase - King of the Hill
description:
Created for a game design class at University of Baltimore. Objective is to program a kit to be used by a designer. Designers are not allowed to view, edit, or create new scripts. 

This kit, King of the Hill, was designed and created by Ben. I used the kit and free to use assets to put together this short demo using the tools and functionality of the kit.  

Credits:

Ben - Programmed the kit used in this project. 

King NG -  from the Unity Asset Store made both of the characters.

  • Ninja
  • Dragon

2D & 3D Artists Focus on 2D (Pixel and Vector) -Character design -Animations -UI -BG Contact: animationclock@gmail.com
